name: Fight the Sadness
description:
• When a face grows to full size it will spread.  
  • When a face touches its neighbour it will spread.
  • Allow the happy faces to grow and spread.
  • Tap the sad faces to keep them small.

Please note that the sound does not work on all devices - it's on by default, so if you hear nothing, it's not working on your device.  There's no music - only sound effects.
